column4: Hiya. I'm trying to install avidemux on Fiesty (may or may not be a good idea). The wiki's directions for Ubuntu say to type "apt-get cache search avidemux" after adding Universe etc to sources.list.What are these cache and search arguments? I don't recognize them and neither does the shell.
means you search in your cache of the packages list
on a terminal type apt-cache search avidemux
